dakari.name: Dakari
dakari.description: Complete migration from WordPress to Next.js, improving performance and user experience.

responsibilities: Development and maintenance of the Médico Online project, a telemedicine platform initiated before the pandemic.
Migration of JavaScript and jQuery code to React (18.3.1) with Redux and Tokbox.
Participation in development with .NET and C# for backend logic.
Use of Angular v13 and database management with SQL (2022).
Development in Spartacus, an Angular-based framework for SAP Commerce.
Implementation of new features and component optimization in Spartacus to improve user experience.
Participation in Deprati (Vue.js) and Promesa (Spartacus) projects, collaborating in the design and implementation of interactive and dynamic interfaces.
Application of SCRUM methodology with Jira and use of Bitbucket for code management and versioning.
Development and integration of modules in Angular v11 for a banking payments platform.
Work in Software Factory with project rotation.
Implementation of SCRUM methodology for better daily work tracking.
Repository management through TFS 2018 and Git for branch management.
Freelance work using SCRUM methodology with ticket management.
Development in marketing project for companies with Micro-Services architecture and GraphQL.
Work with Angular (V9) in collaboration with the frontend lead.
Repository management through GitLab and documentation with Notion.
First professional experience with training in Angular (V8).
Learning of programming fundamentals, Git, and SCRUM methodologies.
Development of teamwork and collaboration skills.
Contribution to interface creation using Figma.
